fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Peeb 1 yek and give another player Basic defense for the night. (*Peebing yeks uses up the yeks.*)
- Peeb 2 yeks to transport 2 players. You may transport yourself..
- Peeb 3 yeks to give the Unseen an Invincible autovest but making the Unseen unable to convert anyone until it's broken.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 yek every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
